__e: The both of us is handsome devils. We both like RC Cola. And neither one of us got an old man worth a damn.
I mean, there isn't a surface that isn't covered in spilled soda, so you'd think it'd be a nightmare for me, right?
They shoot up a temperature. They start running at the nose and... the next day, they're out running around like nothing happened.
I got snot coming out of my nose.
Your fucking nose is running all over me.

I just try and understand when you do things like this that you're doing them because you're ill and then I don't get angry the same way you wouldn't get angry at someone with a cold for having a runny nose.
